name: thedailybeast
text: “When [Floyd] said ‘I can't breathe’... police think that if you can talk then you can breath. That is not true,” Dr. Michael Baden said in a press conference, adding that Floyd has no underlying medical condition that would have contributed to his death. https://t.co/pSusPrMSb8

text:

Twitter restricted the tweet for violating its policies against glorifying violence—but did not remove it. https://t.co/trrT4ssG4v

text:

After he exhorted the protesters not to let outsiders incite violence, Monahan was asked to kneel with protesters. So he did. https://t.co/9itSldo5FJ
